instructions:
Season chicken with lemon pepper seasoning. Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray and heat 1 minute. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add shallots and garlic and cook until tender.
Add broth, cream and tarragon. Heat to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minutes or until done.
title: Chicken in Tarragon Cream Sauce
ingredients: 1 cup Swanson® Chicken Broth (Regular, Natural Goodness™ or Certified Organic)
